details.arabic_diacless: رب لا تذرنى فردا وانت خير الوٰرثين
details.arabic: رَبِّ لَا تَذَرۡنِىۡ فَرۡدًا وَّاَنۡتَ خَيۡرُ الۡوٰرِثِيۡنَ
details.transliteration: Rabbi la tatharnee fardan waanta khayru alwaritheen
details.translations: My Lord, do not leave me alone [with no heir], while you are the best of inheritors
